name: Treasure Of Pirates
description:
This is a game we just porting from KaiOS, we didn't do much optimization. so the inputs will be kind of simulating the inputs on the phone, we're sorry for this, and thanks for playing!

Controls:

  • Arrow Up for moving the ship.
  • Q for the "Left Soft Key"
  • W for the "Left Soft Key"
  • Enter for choosing a level.
